Loved the color. Right thickness. Good stretch.  True to size 5’ 125lbs size small. While this is very cozy/soft, Cute style it’s not the material I was looking for. I was looking for more authentic, quality smooth texture; this feels more like a soft microfiber fabric, wrinkles easily. Returning.

This a such a cute jacket and keeps you warm but I'm really bummed that it sheds so much!
Love this coat and the thickness is perfect. Keeps me warm. Only negative is it leaves fuzz all over my clothes

I was not expecting much from this jacket, but my mind was blown. This is THICK! The material is heavenly. The quality is above and beyond for what this zip up cost!!!! I literally kept saying “oh, WOW!” To myself as I was flipping it around and putting it on! New favorite for sure. BUY THIS you don’t regret it. For reference I got a M and I am 5’4 125lb 34DD.

This jacket is definitely one of my go to’s. The arms give a slight oversized baggy feel which I personally love. The jacket itself is fairly thick for cold nights while still maintaining a breathable feeling. You’re also able to adjust the tightness around the waist which is a plus. I highly recommend this jacket to any and everyone.

Love love love this jacket. It is thick, and so so soft. Great Value for money. Highly recommend for someone looking for a casual jacket.

I bought 2 (coffee & khaki colors) thinking I would try them on and choose which one i liked best. Welp, I'm keeping both! They are soooo comfortable, soft, and cute. They're warm but not too thick - a little thicker than a sweatshirt so perfect for a cool day or add a vest for a colder day. I'm 5'5 and about 150lbs and the medium fit nicely. The bottom is a little boxy  (think crop top but a little longer) but you are able to adjust the bottom to fit tightly around your waist.  I would definitely recommend!

I am loving this sweater and living in it this fall. I got the size medium and it fits me a little oversized just how I wanted it while still cinching at waist height or just below. It’s super warm and comfortable.  A couple minor cons: it does shed a little bit at first but after a few washes it seems to stop shedding. I do wish the pockets were designed differently so I didn’t feel like my stuff will fall out (the pockets are completely horizontal) but overall the pros completely outweigh the cons for me personally.

This jacket is so cute, warm and stretchy…HOWEVER, I wore it once and the fleece pills off. It rolled off in chunks, all over everything. All day long. Any time something rubbed against it, it rolled off. I’ve never worn it again. Very cheaply made.

This jacket is super cute and so comfortable. I love the material too. I usually wear S size but I bought M since I was going to wear few cloth under. This jacket is big size M. I should had bought S size. But other than that so perfect. One of the best jacket I have now!

Do not buy!! This jacket sheds fuzz everywhere! It’s all over any item you wear with it, car seats and seatbelts, sheds on the floor, etc. I’ve tried washing it twice but it has not helped. I am going to throw it away because it is making such a mess. Waste of money.
